app_description: In the quiet night, reflect on your day and organize your thoughts.
audio_not_supported: Audio feature not supported in this browser
audio_error: Could not load music. Continue writing your diary without music.
diary_content_placeholder_dark:
In the quiet night, how was your day?
Share your deep thoughts under the moonlight.
Even small emotions become precious memories...
diary_content_placeholder_light:
How was your day today? 
Feel free to write about joyful, difficult, or grateful moments.
Even small moments become precious memories...
footer_message_dark: May your day lead to beautiful dreams under the starlight.
footer_message_light: May your precious day remain as beautiful memories, like warm sunshine.
support_thanks: Thank you for loving "End of Day"
support_message: Let's create a better 'End of Day' together
small_support_message: Even small support is a great encouragement to the developer. Your heart is the driving force for creating better services.
hall_of_fame_description: Precious people who supported "End of Day"
developer_thanks_message: Your precious support is the driving force for creating better services. We will continue to do our best to beautifully record your precious daily life.
app_promo_description: Record and manage faster, anytime, anywhere.
support_message_detail: We will continue to develop and improve to keep your precious diaries safer and more beautiful.
small_support_message_detail:
Even small support is a great encouragement to the developer.
Your heart is the driving force for creating better services.
app_promo_aria_label: End of Day Mobile App Promotion Banner
seo_intro_prefix: is an online diary to record your precious day.
seo_intro_suffix: Freely write down your thoughts and emotions with sentimental themes and music, and create your own secret diary.
contact_description: Feel free to contact us with any questions, bug reports, or suggestions for improvement. We will respond within 24 hours.
